title: “Trump’s Recovery Summer.”
description: Trump celebrates another month of double-digit unemployment and rising Covid infections, and Dan and Jon answer your questions about reopening schools, the Lincoln Project, DC statehood, Supreme Court vacancies, Pod Save America dance-offs, and more. Then political message guru Anat Shenker-Osorio talks to Dan about 2020 campaign ads and the race-class narrative.
author: hey@crooked.com (Crooked Media)

Then political message guru Anat Shenker-Osorio talks to Dan about 2020 campaign ads and the race-class narrative.
